overview:
lan Solel brings more than 10 years of experience in international sales and business development in the telecommunications market to his role at TOA Technologies.

Before joining TOA in 2004, Mr. Solel held management positions in sales and business development at Scitex Vision Europe and Maxbill, Ltd. in Israel. He began his career as business development manager at Paspartoo, an Internet company focused on providing a platform for graphic and print industries. He has an MSc from Oxford University and a BA from the Bar Ilan University in Ramat Gan, Israel.
